ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List incidents
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List incidents
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List existing incidents.
An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List incidents

List existing incidents. An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)

Method: Get

OperationID: listIncidents

EndPoint:

/incidents
